leve.name: Taken for Granite
leve.description: A young noble from House Fortemps was in his cups when he made japes about the pace of Falcon's Nest's reconstruction, saying House Dzemael's artisans could have stone bound to their feet and one would see nary a difference in progress. House Dzemael did not take too kindly to this comment, and announced they would open their own quarry, cutting House Fortemps's commissioned shipments of stone. Provide me with samples from possible areas where the quarry may be dug.
leve.client: Temple Knights Second Commander Ser Handeloup
